body:
Hi all,

This small PR tries to address issue #14679 .
The first part of the error came from the file `wcslib.h` being located in `<wcslib-prefix>/include/wcs.h` instead of `<wcslib-prefix>/include/wcslib/wcs.h`.

I tried to use the `find_headers()` function and mimic what was in done for the `OpenMPI` package.py file.
But I am unable to make it work.

I also can't seem to use `debug_print()` or `print()` to see in the shell if my changes are actually being read.

Do you have any suggestions?
Thanks,
Diana
title: [WIP] Fix py-astropy header for wcslib
